## pick() function

Picks the specified properties from the source object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function pick<T, K extends ObjectKey<T>>(source: T, ...args: K[]): Pick<T, K>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

source


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The source object from which properties will be picked


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

args


</td><td>

K\[\]


</td><td>

The properties to pick


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Pick&lt;T, K&gt;

A new object with the specified properties picked

## Example


```ts
pick({ a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 }, "a", "c") // { a: 1, c: 3 }
```
